## SendableProtocol.repayDebtToken() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

**Signature:**

```typescript
repayDebtToken(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```
